title: Looking for a few older games to learn with !!!
body: HI all am still new to this game and am of the older generation game. Still learning and only level 18. Seems to be a lot of fun until you get a player that thinks everyone needs to be at world camps level. !!  Based in NZ

replies.body: ah typing on the keyboard, another fierce battle gamers must undertake to ultimately get their message across while simultaneously trying to fight off the enemy team
Older Players? Here is another one! I normally play with my son. I am not on all the time but add me and we can play together.
Sorry yes gamers ... need to read my posts !!!
